title: Citigroup’s Jane Fraser Says the Bank’s Overhaul Will Take Years
sub_head: At her first investor day as CEO, Fraser laid out her vision and set a new profitability target
body:
Citigroup Inc. has underperformed its big-bank peers and needs a comprehensive transformation that will take years, Chief Executive Jane Fraser told investors Wednesday.
Kicking off her first investor day presentation a year and a day after taking over the bank, Ms. Fraser outlined the conclusions she and her new management team had reached after what she described as an honest review.
